title: Dear Zachary - A Letter To A Son About His Father.divx
description:
A filmmaker memorializes his murdered friend with a movie/letter to his friend's son.
Redacted from IMDB synopsis (so as to not include spoiler): <a href=" http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1152758/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1152758/</a>


---------------------

Re: Comment by filmczy: If you would watch the film before commenting, you would see that this upload is the full documentary, regardless of the 'running time' elsewhere listed.  Having seen (and uploaded) the film, I know the end credits were sped up, without affecting the content.
